Package com.nrifintech.cms.controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/order/") public class OrderController extends Object
> This class is a Spring controller that handles requests to the `/order` endpoint

  • Method Details

    • addOrders

      @PostMapping("addorders") public Response addOrders​(@RequestBody List<Order> orders)
      It takes a list of orders, adds them to the database, and returns a response
      Parameters:
      orders - A list of orders to be added.
      Returns:
      A response object with a message and a status code.

    • getOrders

      @GetMapping("getorders") public Response getOrders()
      > Get all orders from the database
      Returns:
      A list of orders.

    • getOrders

      @GetMapping("getorders/{orderIds}") public Response getOrders​(@PathVariable List<String> orderIds)
      > Get a list of orders by their orderIds
      Parameters:
      orderIds - A list of order ids.
      Returns:
      A list of orders.

    • addFeedback

      @PostMapping("addfeedback/{orderId}") public Response addFeedback​(@PathVariable Integer orderId, @RequestBody FeedBackDto feedBackDto)
      It adds a feedback to an order
      Parameters:
      orderId - The id of the order to which the feedback is to be added.
      feedBackDto - This is the object that will be sent to the server.
      Returns:
      A response object with a message and a status code.

    • updateOrderStatus

      @PostMapping("updatestatus/{orderId}/{statusId}") public Response updateOrderStatus​(@PathVariable Integer orderId, @PathVariable Integer statusId, Principal principal)
      > It updates the status of an order and sends an email to the user if the order is delivered
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of the order to be updated
      statusId - the status id of the order.
      principal - This is the user who is logged in.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • placeOrder

      @PostMapping("placeorder/{id}") public Response placeOrder​(@PathVariable Integer id)
      It places an order for the user with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user who is placing the order.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • cancelOrder

      @PostMapping("cancelorder/{orderId}") public Response cancelOrder​(Principal principal, @PathVariable Integer orderId)
      It cancels the order.
      Parameters:
      principal - The principal object is used to get the user's email address.
      orderId - The order id of the order to be cancelled.
      Returns:
      Response object

    • getOrderQuantity

      @GetMapping("getorderquantity/{date}") public Response getOrderQuantity​(@PathVariable Date date)
